text.div:
High Density Lipoprotein

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include these codes as defined in http://loinc.org
    Code Display
    11054-4 Cholesterol in LDL/Cholesterol in HDL [Mass Ratio] in Serum or Plasma
    12771-2 Cholesterol in HDL [Presence] in Serum or Plasma by Electrophoresis
    12772-0 Cholesterol in HDL [Units/volume] in Serum or Plasma by Electrophoresis
    14646-4 Cholesterol in HDL [Moles/volume] in Serum or Plasma
    16616-5 Cholesterol in HDL/Cholesterol in LDL [Mass Ratio] in Serum or Plasma
    18263-4 Cholesterol in HDL [Mass/volume] in Serum or Plasma ultracentrifugate
    2085-9 Cholesterol in HDL [Mass/volume] in Serum or Plasma
    26015-8 Cholesterol in HDL 2 [Moles/volume] in Serum or Plasma
    26016-6 Cholesterol in HDL 2 [Mass/volume] in Serum or Plasma ultracentrifugate
    26017-4 Cholesterol in HDL 3 [Moles/volume] in Serum or Plasma
    27340-9 Cholesterol in HDL [Presence] in Serum or Plasma
    35197-3 Cholesterol in HDL [Mass or Moles/volume] in Serum or Plasma
    35243-5 Cholesterol in HDL 3 [Mass or Moles/volume] in Serum or Plasma
    43396-1 Cholesterol non HDL [Mass/volume] in Serum or Plasma
    44915-7 Cholesterol in LDL/Cholesterol in HDL [Molar ratio] in Serum or Plasma
    47220-9 Cholesterol in HDL 4+5 [Mass/volume] in Serum or Plasma
    47221-7 Cholesterol in HDL 1+2 [Mass/volume] in Serum or Plasma
    47228-2 Cholesterol non HDL/Cholesterol.total [Mass Ratio] in Serum or Plasma
    49130-8 Cholesterol in HDL [Mass/volume] in Serum or Plasma by Electrophoresis
    54467-6 Cholesterol in HDL 2a/Cholesterol in total HDL in Serum or Plasma by Electrophoresis
    54468-4 Cholesterol in HDL 2b/Cholesterol in total HDL in Serum or Plasma by Electrophoresis
    54469-2 Cholesterol in HDL 3a/Cholesterol in total HDL in Serum or Plasma by Electrophoresis
    54470-0 Cholesterol in HDL 3b/Cholesterol in total HDL in Serum or Plasma by Electrophoresis
    54471-8 Cholesterol in HDL 3c/Cholesterol in total HDL in Serum or Plasma by Electrophoresis
